ng.product-overview.lbl.yup-product-acti: Unfortunately you cannot order new services online. Contact our customer service for this.
ng.product-overview.lbl.suspended-plan: Your Telenet services have been suspended. This means you cannot order options or change your subscription.
ng.product-overview.lbl.product-is-under: Your services will soon be transferred to a new address. As soon as the services have been transferred, you will be able to make adjustments again.
ng.product-overview.lbl.modem-upgrade-ba: You can order a new modem. That way you surf giga-fast up to 1GB.
ng.product-price-changes.description-tit: What does that mean for you concretely?
ng.product-price-changes.description-sum:
For you, that means a total increase of your monthly bill by {{totalPriceIncrease}}. Do you currently have any promotions or discounts ?

Then you can of course enjoy it until the end of your promotion period.

For you, that means a total increase of your per quarter by {{totalPriceIncrease}} . Do you currently have any promotions or discounts ?

Then you can of course enjoy it until the end of your promotion period.

For you, that equates to a total increase in your semi-annual bill by {{totalPriceIncrease}}. Do you currently have any promotions or discounts ?

Then you can of course enjoy it until the end of your promotion period.

For you, that equates to a total annual increase of {{totalPriceIncrease}}. Do you currently have any promotions or discounts ?

Then you can of course enjoy it until the end of your promotion period.
ng.product-price-changes.text.subscripti: Prices quoted include VAT and are subject to material errors, mistakes and/or changes.
Prices quoted are exclusive of VAT and are subject to material errors, mistakes and/or changes.
ng.product-price-changes.no-price-change: There is no price adjustment for your services.
ng.product-price-changes.cannot-show-per:
We are currently unable to show your personal situation. The possible reason is that…
  • you recently made changes to your subscriptions. Try again later.
  • your new services are not yet active. Try again after activation or installation.
  • you are not logged in with the correct credentials. Try again with the login that you will find at the top left of your payment statement or invoice.
  • there are no changes to your current subscriptions.
ng.product-price-changes.login-last-name: Enter your last name or company name here
ng.product-price-changes.price-adjustmen: From 5 June 2024, new prices will apply to our subscriptions. It concerns the fixed, monthly subscription costs for internet, mobile and fixed telephony, cable and digital television. They increase by 6%.
ng.product-price-changes.ocapi.wrong-cre: Incorrect combination of name and customer number. Will you try again?
ng.product-price-changes.client.informat: Where can I find my client number?
You are logged in with a limited user role. Sign in with the administrator username to access all parts of the app.
ng.product-overview.lbl.grandfathering-c: Note! If you continue now, you may lose the social tariff discount you currently benefit from.
ng.ocapi.403-OCAPI-ERR-004-errorfield: User is missing the required scope for requested property.
